description: MEaSUREs ITS_LIVE Landsat Image-Pair Glacier and Ice Sheet Surface Velocities, Version 1. This data set, part of NASA's Making Earth System Data Records for Use in Research Environments (MEASURES) Program, provides global measurements of glacier and ice sheet surface velocities at 240 m resolution, generated from Landsat 4, 5, 7, and 8 optical image pairs, primarily for land ice areas larger than 5 kmÂ². It is considered a beta version (Version 1.0).
title: ITS_LIVE Landsat Image-Pair Glacier and Ice Sheet Surface Velocities, Version 1
